name: SpaceX
content: Dennis and Akiko Tito are the first two crewmembers on Starship's second commercial spaceflight around the moon →

name: Elon Musk
content: We might need a different name, as this is basically just Starlink with roaming capability, so you can take your terminal anywhere.

embed.content: Starlink for RVs now has over 100,000 customers! Access high-speed, low-latency internet on an as-needed basis anywhere Starlink provides active coverage → starlink.com/rv
